title: John Warnock, Adobe CEO who led desktop publishing revolution, dies at 82
description: He helped create the PDF and software that turned computers into digital printing presses.

title: Not everything is secret in encrypted apps like iMessage and WhatsApp
description: Read this to find out if Apple, Google, or your phone company might be able to see everything in your family group chat. Spoiler alert: Yeah, maybe!

title: Traffic on Meta’s Threads is declining as company adds features
description: Meta announced a desktop version of Threads, part of a slew of options Meta has added to the text-based social media platform.
